comments.author: Maxine
comments.content:
This is beautiful!! I had a similar idea last week wanting to make a "simple" blueberry tart with pastry cream. I chickened out when I realized the effort involved and made this instead: http://chewonthatblog.com/2008/08/07/baking-with-blueberries/
But your tart looks gorgeous - I love the pretty design :)
